text: "We All Fall in Love Someday" is the ninth track from his ninth studio album Captain Fantastic and the Brown Dirt Cowboy. It was covered by Jeff Buckley and Coldplay in 2018 for the album Revamp: Reimagining the Songs of Elton John & Bernie Taupin. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Jeff Buckley songs Category:Coldplay songs
title: We All Fall in Love Sometimes
